title: doblezero
author: doblezero
content: I'm testing an auction website for LN, I hope you don't bother my publication.2 newspapers from El Salvadorhttps://plebeian.market/auctions/RE

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I am not a fan of that auction site...Â  I know it's not a lot, but I hate spending 21 sats just to have a chance to bid, especially on items that have a reserve. If they would at least get rid of the reserves, I would feel better about paying sats to place a bid.
